testimonials.review: I thoroughly enjoyed the mentor sessions and am grateful to be a part of this program. Special thanks to my Capstone Mentor for helping me complete the project. I also appreciate the Program Managers for ensuring a smooth journey throughout.
testimonials.name: Sai Kumar
